name: Ninja Countdown | Fastest Countdown Builder ( With Elementor Widget )
author: Light Plugins

sections.description:
Are you looking for a Countdown timer for Elementor or Short code supported? We are here to help you.You will love the simplicity of the plugin.
We make it for those who dont want to load junk assets.If you dont have enough time to maintain your Countdown then Ninja Countdown is the best option to choose.

It is that Countdown Plugin that you expected in your plugins bucket! It just needs 2 clicks to make a Beautiful New Countdown!!

Why Ninja Countdown ?

  • Fastest Ninja Countdown Builder is the Fastest Countdown Builder.
  • Simplest Simple to set up.
  • Lightweight No un-used assets loads. Assets size is just 10kb.
  • Organized The plugin is well Organized to set up a new Countdown.
  • Live Preview You can edit and show live preview
  • Elementor Widget For the Elementor experts we have Elementor Widget too.
  • Multiple Designs Finally we introduce Multiple Countdowns (Yes, In the same page, of course!!).
sections.faq:
Is The Countdown customizable?

Yes, You can customize everything of the Countdown timer.

Is it elementor supported?

Yes, You will get countdown widget for elementor;

How many ways to show the countdown in the Frontend?

Elementor and Short Code (Gutenberge Shortcode Blocks too!!)

Does it Support multiple countdowns in the same page?

Of Course it does.
sections.changelog:
1.3.0 (Date: July 05, 2021)

  • Added Bulk Actions
  • Copy Shortcode in Clipboard
  • Improve elementor widget
  • Improve Editor UI

1.2.0 (Date: June 17, 2021)

  • Multiple Shortcode Support
  • Bugs : If you are using previous version then re save the same shortcode from the edit page otherwise this version will not show your countdown properly.

1.1.1 (Date: June 13, 2021)

  • Added Elementor Widget
  • Small bug fixing

1.0.1 (Date: June 07, 2021)

  • Added 3 built in layouts
  • Cached feeds for faster load
  • Add short code rendering
  • Fix theme compatibility

1.0.0 (Date: May 15, 2021)

  • Launched the Ninja Countdown!

short_description: Display clean, customizable, and responsive Countdown To Your Wordpress Site.
